headline: American Express Platinum Refresh Seen Offering Growth Potential Despite Customer Fatigue: Analyst
summary: American Express Company's (NYSE:AXP) refreshed Platinum card has drawn mixed reactions from existing customers but appears promising in attracting new ones, according to a survey of 250 affluent consumers. Truist Securities analyst Brian Foran stated that the consumer poll revealed that 27% of current Platinum holders were optimistic about the changes, 35% were neutral, and 25% were negative. headline: lululemon Trades Near 52-Week Low: Buy Opportunity or Time to Sell?
summary: LULU shares hover near a 52-week low as weak U.S. trends, tariff pressures and slashed guidance weigh on investor sentiment.

headline: Lululemon’s ‘downward spiral’ — and how the brand plans to break out of it
summary: High-priced athleisure isn’t dead, but boring athleisure might be. That means it’s back to the innovation drawing board for the much-loved Canadian brand.
